citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There was 1 guinea pig observed with a health condition requiring treatment in accordance with the Program of Veterinary
Care or consultation with the attending veterinarian. A red and white adult guinea pig in Pen G had mild swelling of the
foot pads of the back feet. There were areas where the skin appeared red and coated with debris. The guinea pig was not
displaying signs of lameness and appeared alert and in good body condition. The licensee had not observed the condition
and was not administering any treatment.
Swollen feet can be painful and if caused by an infection, can worsen and spread to other parts of the body and result in
other health issues.
The licensee must communicate with the attending veterinarian to evaluate this animal and determine an appropriate plan
for diagnosis and treatment.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There was 1 guinea pig observed with a health condition requiring treatment in accordance with the Program of Veterinary 
Care or consultation with the attending veterinarian. A red and white adult guinea pig in Pen G had mild swelling of the 
foot pads of the back feet. There were areas where the skin appeared red and coated with debris. The guinea pig was not 
displaying signs of lameness and appeared alert and in good body condition. The licensee had not observed the condition 
and was not administering any treatment. 
Swollen feet can be painful and if caused by an infection, can worsen and spread to other parts of the body and result in 
other health issues. 
The licensee must communicate with the attending veterinarian to evaluate this animal and determine an appropriate plan 
for diagnosis and treatment. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
